info.title: Tool - Fear Inoculum Review
info.description: In this episode, we review the new Tool album, "Fear Inoculum". We had some disagreements here and there, and gave some insight into the band's writing style and comparisons to previous albums.

info.title: What Makes A Good Concert?
info.description: In this episode, we talk about our favorite live experiences as well as some concert horror stories, and create our dream concert lineup.

info.title: The Music Industry
info.description: Luke, Liam, and Elias provide some insight into how the music industry has evolved, and how digital media and self-publishing are revolutionizing the way artists promote themselves.

info.title: Year/Decade in Review
info.description: In this episode, Liam, Elias, Luke, and Jackson wrap up the year/decade by revealing some of our favorite albums, discussing the internet's favorite albums, and speaking at length about a particular artist that shaped this decade in a massive way.

info.title: Run the Jewels - RTJ4 Review
info.description: The music podcast is back! We review the latest Run the Jewels album, discussing its profound, captivating lyrics and top-notch production. We also spend a lot of time talking about the ongoing racial tensions and political disillusion in America, which plays into the albumâ€™s themes. The podcast ends with a powerful poem by Kaila.

info.title: 2020 Album Roundup: Jessie Ware, Thundercat, King Krule
info.description: We're halfway through 2020, so we're here to discuss our favorite albums so far. We go through some of our individual picks, followed by group discussions on Jessie Ware's "What's Your Pleasure", Thundercat's "It Is What It Is", and King Krule's "Man Alive!"

info.title: Idles - Ultra Mono Review
info.description: Loud, outspoken, and critically acclaimed UK rock band IDLES returns with their third full-length album, "Ultra Mono"! We talk about which tracks had us headbanging the most, our favorite lyrics to yell along to, and how some people on the internet (in Grant's term, "virgins") may have over-analyzed the album.
info.descriptionAppend: (Check out their new EP at deathwillbringchange.bandcamp.com)

info.title: 2020 Album Awards!
info.description: In this jam-packed finale episode, we discuss our Discord server's Top 15 Albums of 2020! Find out which ones we awarded Best 420 Album, Best Lyrics, Best Night Drive Album, and Anthem of 2020!
